(Nagisz UWP terminal)
(szerszám beállítás)
t1 m d1.5 h19
yxz

t1
s50
f200

th = 2.2
db = 2.5
dk = sum(5.8,1.5,1.5)
print "dk: $dk"

c = 0.2

(h 4,4 d7.5 z1.2 c0.175 g0,0,0 np)
(h 4,4 d5 z1.2 c0.175 g0,0,0 np)

x = div($dk,2)
y = div($dk,2)
o = add($dk,1)

(1.sor)

h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c g2,0.5,0.5 np

x = add($x,$o)

h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c g2,0.5,0.5 np

x = add($x,$o)

h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c g2,0.5,0.5 np

x = add($x,$o)

h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c g2,0.5,0.5 np

x = add($x,$o)

h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c g2,0.5,0.5 np

x = add($x,$o)

h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c g2,0.5,0.5 np

x = add($x,$o)

h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c g2,0.5,0.5 np

x = add($x,$o)

h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c g2,0.5,0.5 np

(2.sor)
y = add($y,$o)
x = 4

h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c g2,0.5,0.5 np

x = add($x,$o)

h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c g2,0.5,0.5 np

x = add($x,$o)

h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c g2,0.5,0.5 np

x = add($x,$o)

h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c g2,0.5,0.5 np

x = add($x,$o)

h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c g2,0.5,0.5 np

x = add($x,$o)

h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c g2,0.5,0.5 np

x = add($x,$o)

h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c g2,0.5,0.5 np

x = add($x,$o)
